turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to place an order at the Starbucks on 188th St. in Fresh Meadows, NY.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Starbucks 61-51 188th St, Fresh Meadows, NY 11365. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a grande Cinnamon Dolce Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, a grande Cinnamon Dolce Latte. What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please make that with skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, skim milk. Is there anything else you would like to add to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want to add whip cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Add whip cream on top of the drink, okay. Would you like the order to be placed now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Please hold while I place the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, no problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am placing your order now with the credit card you on file.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed and will be ready for pickup in 20 minutes. The receipt will be emailed to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you. Goodbye.
